WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 19 NOV
   BY M/V OCEANIC SIRIUS TOWING 12 11112 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-31.55S 040-58.48W, 22-44.48S 039-55.05W,
   22-29.78S 037-34.05W, 26-36.98S 037-28.17W,
   26-50.10S 042-42.83W, 24-20.05S 042-40.10W,
   24-20.47S 041-39.17W, 23-52.13S 041-38.77W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2744/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 20 NOV 21.
